statements: UPDATE drivers SET start_location='New York', end_location='Los Angeles' WHERE driver_id=1;
UPDATE drivers SET distance_covered=150.75, delivery_count=10 WHERE driver_name='John Smith';
UPDATE drivers SET distance_covered = 120.5, delivery_count = delivery_count + 1 WHERE driver_id = 101
UPDATE drivers SET start_location = 'Warehouse A', end_location = 'Customer Location B', delivery_count = 10 WHERE driver_id = 102
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance = 15.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'Completed', delivery_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE history_id = 3;
UPDATE delivery_routes SET distance = 10.5, route = 'Route A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'Delivered', delivery_date = '2022-10-20', delivery_time = '15:30:00' WHERE history_id = 5;
UPDATE delivery_data SET delivery_address = '123 Main St' WHERE delivery_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE driver_performance SET total_deliveries = 100, average_delivery_time = '01:30:00' WHERE driver_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE delivery_data SET delivery_address = '123 Main St' WHERE delivery_id = 'f25ed9e7-39f6-472f-baab-3ad13a8fa4e5';
UPDATE driver_routes SET route_details = '{"routes": ["Route A", "Route B", "Route C"]}' WHERE driver_id = 'a7a4fb13-5147-4d05-a211-1cdb1ad7cbe1';
UPDATE drivers SET driver_name = 'John Doe' WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'Delivered', delivery_timestamp = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE delivery_id = 1 AND driver_id = 1;
UPDATE drivers SET driver_phone = '555-1234' WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'Delivered', delivery_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE delivery_id = 1001;
UPDATE drivers SET driver_rating = 4.5 WHERE driver_id = 'c2186f2b-ee75-4e12-bb68-6465ca549410';
UPDATE delivery_history SET delivery_status = 'DELIVERED' WHERE delivery_id = '1ae14723-2c23-4cce-ba7e-9b2a82c02aac';
UPDATE drivers SET driver_name = 'John Doe' WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE driver_performance SET total_distance_covered = total_distance_covered + 1000, average_rating = 4.5 WHERE driver_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
